# -- cryaction_durango.waf_files --
sources_platform(DURANGO)
add_sources("CryAction_main_uber_durango.cpp"
	PROJECTS CryAction
	SOURCE_GROUP "Player Profiles"
		"PlayerProfiles/PlayerProfileImplDurango.h"

# -- cryaction_orbis.waf_files --
sources_platform(ORBIS)
add_sources("CryAction_main_uber_orbis.cpp"
	PROJECTS CryAction
	SOURCE_GROUP "Player Profiles"
		"PlayerProfiles/PlayerProfileImplOrbis.h"
		"PlayerProfiles/PlayerProfileImplOrbis.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEngineModule(CryAction PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine")

target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE md5)
if (WINDOWS)
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE Shell32)
endif()
if(DURANGO)
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE jsmn)
endif()

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} INTERFACE "$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>" "$<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include/CryAction>")

# Remove once we've switched to entity components
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryPlugins/CryDefaultEntities/Module")

install(DIRECTORY . DESTINATION include/CryAction FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.h")
install(DIRECTORY . DESTINATION include/CryAction FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.hpp")

if (ORBIS OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
		-Wno-parentheses
		-Wno-reorder
		-Wno-unknown-pragmas
		-Wno-format
		-Wno-switch
		-Wno-comment
		-Wno-unused-private-field
		-Wno-empty-body
		-Wno-multichar
		-Wno-unused-value
		-Wno-null-conversion
		-Wno-unused-function
		-Wno-c++11-narrowing
		-Wno-char-subscripts
		-Wno-overloaded-virtual
	)
elseif(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
		-Wno-unused-function
		-Wno-unused-value
		-Wno-sign-compare
		-Wno-ignored-attributes
		-Wno-int-in-bool-context
		-Wno-unused-but-set-variable
		-Wno-misleading-indentation
		-Wno-unknown-pragmas
		-Wno-strict-aliasing
		-Wno-maybe-uninitialized
		-Wno-unused-const-variable
		-Wno-multichar
		-Wno-char-subscripts
		-Wno-parentheses
		-Wno-unused-result
		-Wno-uninitialized
		-Wno-comment
		-Wno-address
		-Wno-format
		-Wno-switch
	)
endif()
